name: The Secret of Middle City
description: Inspired by classics such as "Monkey Island" and "Broken Sword", intriguing and seducing like a "Twin Peaks" parody, "The Secret of Middle City" is an adventure that takes place in a typical north-american mountain town and that sees the protagonist, the goofy and clumsy Federal Agent Cox, strive am
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP , Windows 7 , Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Pentium 1.4GHz Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: On-board graphic card Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Standard on-board sound card
